I bring a YouTube video through "YouTube Repeat":http://www.yourepeat.com/ to make the initial gif, then I edit the gif a bit using a combination of "Online Image Editor":http://www.online-image-editor.com/ and "LunaPic.":http://www134.lunapic.com/editor/

On occasion, I'll use "Memecenter's gif maker":http://www.memecenter.com/gifmaker
